metadataAttributes.Title: Forex - Trading Around the World
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, we’ll introduce you to the foreign currency market, including who participates in it and some of their reasons for doing so. You’ll also gain an understanding of the complex nature of certain trading products, as well as some of the risks investors typically face.
metadataAttributes.Skills: FX Case Study,FX Trading,currency pairs,Foreign Exchange Market (FOREX),Monetary Policy,
